abstract: bidaskclub upgrades huron consulting group to `` hold ''
article: bidaskclub upgraded shares of huron consulting group from a sell rating to a hold rating in a report issued on wednesday . several other equities research analysts have also recently issued reports on the stock . william blair raised shares of huron consulting group from a market perform rating to an outperform rating in a research report on friday , september 8th . suntrust banks reissued a buy rating and issued a $ 48.00 target price on shares of huron consulting group in a research report on friday , october 20th . finally , zacks investment research raised shares of huron consulting group from a strong sell rating to a hold rating in a research report on monday , october 16th .

five research analysts have rated the stock with a hold rating and three have given a buy rating to the stock . the stock presently has an average rating of hold and an average target price of $ 48.00 . shares of huron consulting group opened at $ 40.45 on wednesday . huron consulting group has a 12 month low of $ 29.52 and a 12 month high of $ 51.70 . the stock has a market cap of $ 895.12 , a pe ratio of 19.73 , a price-to-earnings-growth ratio of 1.22 and a beta of 0.12 . the company has a current ratio of 1.45 , a quick ratio of 1.45 and a debt-to-equity ratio of 0.71 .

huron consulting group last released its earnings results on wednesday , november 1st . the business services provider reported $ 0.43 earnings per share for the quarter , missing the thomson reuters ' consensus estimate of $ 0.55 by . huron consulting group had a positive return on equity of 7.50 % and a negative net margin of 17.09 % . the company had revenue of $ 176.40 million during the quarter , compared to analyst estimates of $ 181.27 million . during the same period in the prior year , the business posted $ 0.92 earnings per share .

huron consulting group 's revenue was down 3.8 % on a year-over-year basis . sell-side analysts predict that huron consulting group will post 2.22 earnings per share for the current fiscal year . several institutional investors and hedge funds have recently added to or reduced their stakes in hurn . van berkom & associates inc. . boosted its position in shares of huron consulting group by 68.2 % in the third quarter . van berkom & associates inc. . now owns 1,916,609 shares of the business services provider 's stock worth $ 65,740,000 after acquiring an additional 776,995 shares during the last quarter .

american century companies inc. . acquired a new stake in shares of huron consulting group in the second quarter worth approximately $ 13,881,000 . dimensional fund advisors lp lifted its position in huron consulting group by 11.9 % during the second quarter . dimensional fund advisors lp now owns 1,425,586 shares of the business services provider 's stock valued at $ 61,585,000 after buying an additional 151,495 shares in the last quarter . vanguard group inc. . lifted its position in huron consulting group by 3.7 % during the second quarter . vanguard group inc. . now owns 1,818,993 shares of the business services provider 's stock valued at $ 78,580,000 after buying an additional 64,593 shares in the last quarter .

finally , state street corp lifted its position in huron consulting group by 10.4 % during the second quarter . state street corp now owns 447,219 shares of the business services provider 's stock valued at $ 19,322,000 after buying an additional 42,269 shares in the last quarter . 89.59 % of the stock is currently owned by institutional investors and hedge funds . trademark violation warning : `` bidaskclub upgrades huron consulting group to `` hold '' '' was reported by watch list news and is the property of of watch list news . if you are accessing this piece of content on another site , it was stolen and reposted in violation of united states & international trademark and copyright legislation .
